title: Gender-Based Violence and Women's Security in Timor-Leste

questions.question: What percentage of ever-partnered women aged 15-49 in Timor-Leste have experienced physical and/or sexual violence by an intimate partner in their lifetime?
Which of the following is NOT listed as a type of gender-based violence in Timor-Leste's Law Against Domestic Violence?
What is the term for the traditional bride price practice in Timor-Leste?
What percentage of women in Timor-Leste reported experiencing non-partner sexual violence since age 15?
Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a cultural factor contributing to GBV in Timor-Leste?
In what year was the Law Against Domestic Violence enacted in Timor-Leste?
Which organization conducted the 2015 study on GBV prevalence in Timor-Leste?
What percentage of women in Timor-Leste believe a husband is justified in hitting his wife under certain circumstances?
Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a type of economic violence in the Law Against Domestic Violence?
choices: Impediment to work outside the home
Forcing women to work outside the home
questions.answer: Forcing women to work outside the home

questions.question: What is the name of the public awareness campaign mentioned that addresses GBV in Timor-Leste?
Which demographic group reports higher rates of recent violence in Timor-Leste?
What is the primary focus of the NGO PRADET in addressing GBV in Timor-Leste?
Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a barrier to women seeking help for GBV in Timor-Leste?
choices: Lack of access to support services

questions.question: What is the focus of the NGO Fokupers in addressing GBV in Timor-Leste?
Which annual event is mentioned as part of public awareness efforts on GBV in Timor-Leste?
choices: 16 Days of Activism Against Gender-Based Violence
questions.answer: 16 Days of Activism Against Gender-Based Violence

questions.question: What type of units have been established in police stations to address GBV in Timor-Leste?
Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a long-term impact of GBV on survivors in Timor-Leste?
What is the primary focus of the NGO JSMP in addressing GBV in Timor-Leste?
Which of the following is mentioned as a potential strategy to reduce women's vulnerability to GBV in Timor-Leste?
What is the name of the national action plan addressing GBV in Timor-Leste mentioned in the module?
choices: National Action Plan on Women's Rights
National Action Plan on Gender-Based Violence
questions.answer: National Action Plan on Gender-Based Violence

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a type of violence experienced by women in Timor-Leste?
What percentage of women reported experiencing physical violence by an intimate partner in Timor-Leste?
Which of the following is mentioned as a potential long-term consequence of children witnessing GBV?
choices: Higher likelihood of becoming victims or perpetrators of violence
questions.answer: Higher likelihood of becoming victims or perpetrators of violence

questions.question: What is identified as a major challenge in the justice system's response to GBV cases in Timor-Leste?
choices: Low conviction rates and lenient sentences
questions.answer: Low conviction rates and lenient sentences

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a key component of a multi-faceted approach to addressing GBV in Timor-Leste?
What is suggested as a way to shift societal attitudes towards GBV in Timor-Leste?
choices: Engaging community leaders, including traditional and religious authorities
questions.answer: Engaging community leaders, including traditional and religious authorities

questions.question: Which of the following is mentioned as a potential benefit of economic empowerment programs for women in Timor-Leste?
choices: Increased financial independence and decision-making power
questions.answer: Increased financial independence and decision-making power

questions.question: What is identified as a key challenge in rural areas of Timor-Leste regarding GBV?
choices: Lack of access to support services
questions.answer: Lack of access to support services

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a focus area for interventions supporting GBV survivors in Timor-Leste?
What is suggested as a crucial element in challenging harmful gender norms in Timor-Leste?
choices: Education and awareness programs targeting both men and women
Segregation of genders in public spaces
questions.answer: Education and awareness programs targeting both men and women
